Texts.Chs: 我只要5个^orange;生物燃料罐^reset;就能制造出^cyan;火箭动力豚鼠^reset;。用^orange;沼泽^reset;里发现的^orange;藻豆荚^reset;你也能做出来。我保证这次^red;不会^reset;用致命的蜜蜂来当奖励了。
Texts.Eng: 5 ^orange;Biofuel Canisters^reset; would be all that I needed to create a ^cyan;rocket-powered guinea pig^reset;. With some ^orange;Algae^reset; found in a ^orange;Bog^reset; biome you'd have no problem making some. I promise to ^red;not^reset; reward you with deadly bees this time!

Texts.Chs: 把5份^orange;生物燃料罐^reset;带给荣耀的^red;凯文^reset;
谢谢。你看起来似乎需要来点^orange;娱乐^reset;！自娱自乐很危险！拿着^green;这个^reset;！如果你上瘾后想byebye，请不要急，我正好能用你来试试的新想法。我叫它^orange;自杀舱^reset;，保证无痛。
Texts.Eng: Thanks. You look like you could use some ^orange;party time^reset;! It's dangerous to go alone! Take ^green;this^reset;! Also, if you feel up to it and want to die, I could use help testing my newest invention. It's called a ^orange;Kill Pod^reset; and it's super neat!
